name: IP_ORD_UNACK_MOD
description: This table displays unacknowledged modified orders associated with Inpatient (INP) records.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the inpatient record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORD_UNACK_MODIFY_ID
columns.description: This column stores modified unacknowledged orders associated with this inpatient storage tank.
